step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your fingers closed and arms drawn in. Focus on tightening your muscles as you inhale.
Great job opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles as you move outwards.
Excellent! You're maintaining good form. Continue to open your fingers and extend your arms while exhaling.
Good control here. Ensure your arms extend horizontally to shoulder height and you're exhaling fully.
Nice work completing the first repetition! You're doing well with the outward movement and relaxation.
Second rep starting strong! Remember to close your fingers and draw arms in, inhaling and tightening.
Well done opening fingers and extending arms. Keep up the good exhale and relaxation as you move outwards.
Excellent execution! Continue to open your fingers and extend your arms while exhaling and relaxing.
Good job maintaining shoulder height and exhaling. Focus on a smooth, controlled outward extension.
Fantastic! You completed both repetitions with great form. Keep up the excellent work with the outward movement and relaxation.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles while bringing your arms in, then exhale and relax as you open your fingers and extend your arms horizontally. Keep up the good work!
